lang.lang_choose_prompt: The language to be switched is: {lang}
lang.lang_select_msg: The list to choose from is:{list}

error.lang_command_other_error: There is an error in the language switching processor. Please check the log information for details.
error.lang_command_user_error: The language switching failed, please try again later.
error.user_prompt: Oops, there was an error, please contact {user} and describe the problem.
